Event.PageTitle: South Indian Society - Tamil Music & Dance - Cruise Evening in Thames
Event.MetaKeywords: London cruise, thames cruise, SIS cruise, south indian society cruise
Event.MetaDescription: A cruise evening in Thames on June 2012. Come and Join South Indian Society for a fun ride.
Event.EventHeading: SIS -- Sunset Cruise in Thames -- June 2012
Event.Address: Tower Hill Millennium Pier, 53 Lower Thames Street, EC3R 6DT
Event.Maindescription:
The boat is fully booked. We have absolutely no tickets to be sold. So our sincere request is not to bring any additional guests for whom you have not already paid. Anyone turning up without a confirmed ticket, regrettably, cannot get on board.

வசந்த கால நதிகளிலே
வைரமணி நீரலைகள்
நீரலைகள் மீதினிலே
நெஞ்சிரெண்டின் நினைவலைகள்....

SIS is thrilled to announce a fun filled evening in June, Sunset Cruise on Thames. Let’s welcome the summer with our friends. Let’s gather together on a sun-kissed evening for fabulous music, dance and much more. Tongue tickling food guaranteed.

And all this at a very nominal cost

Spoil yourself, chill out and enjoy.

Remember to mark your diary for June 16, 2012

Date: Saturday the 16th of June 2012
Venue: Tower Hill Millennium Pier, 53 Lower Thames Street, EC3R 6DT
Boarding Time: 5:15 pm
Departure Time: 6 pm

Nearby Stations

National Rail: Fenchurch Street
DLR: Tower Gateway
Tube: Tower Hill

We have reached the full capacity. Our sincere thanks for the overwhelming response.

For those who have not paid yet, we have to apologies that we can't take any more bookings. Will see you all in the next event

For those who have paid, looking forward to welcoming you all aboard

PS

  • Please note that we will operate a first paid first served policy, as the seats in the boat are limited
  • Due to operational difficulties, we operate on no-refund policy
  • Please be advised not to bring alcoholic drink, however drinks can be purchased on your own from the bar
]]>
